text: Clare you were asked to run a bath that doesn't mean to say you go across the landing six times, just run her a bath and Amy will you get in it and then come down Clare.
I'm tired and I don't want to cope with you, otherwise you both go to bed this minute.
I said you run her a bath.
And then , well why is you clumpering across the landing six or seven times?
Well just run her a bath and then come down.
If you don't, you go to bed.
